resources.string: For Bitcoin write: BTC "your wallet address"\n For Bkash write: Bkash "your bkash personal number"\n For Rocket write: Rocket "your rocket personal number"

Cash Coin is a Freelance earning platform. You can earn with this community around $2 dollar per day.

 Here is some earning instruction:
 1. Earning via quiz: Firstly select an category and start playing quiz.
 2. Earning via spin: You will get daily 5 spin limit and you can earn around 175 cash coin.
 3. Earn via ads view: Firstly click Earn with adview button and start viewing ads you can earn 10 points for every 1 ads.
 
 If any kinds of query please fill free to contact info.bluesoftitltd@gmail.com
 
 Happy earning..
